dashboard.title: Your Asylum Journey
dashboard.markCompleteDescription: Mark this item as complete or incomplete
dashboard.noTimelineData: No timeline data available. Please complete the questionnaire to generate your personalized timeline.

courtHearing.title: Immigration Court Hearing
courtHearing.description: Appear at {{court}} ({{location}}). Failure to appear may result in removal order.
courtHearing.descriptionGeneric: Appear at your assigned court. Failure to appear may result in removal order.

i589Deadline.title: I-589 Filing Deadline
i589Deadline.description: File your asylum application within one year of arrival. Missing this deadline severely limits your options.

workPermit.title: Work Permit Eligibility (I-765)
workPermit.description: You may be eligible to apply for Employment Authorization Document 150 days after filing I-589. Call USCIS to confirm your eligibility status.

biometrics.title: Biometrics Appointment
biometrics.description: Attend your biometrics appointment (typically 2-6 weeks after filing)

tpsExpiration.title: TPS Status Expiration
tpsExpiration.description: File asylum application before TPS expires to maintain exception eligibility

paroleExpiration.title: Parole Status Expiration
paroleExpiration.description: File asylum application before parole expires to maintain exception eligibility

lateFilingOptions.title: Exception May Apply
lateFilingOptions.description: Your TPS/Parole status may provide an exception to the one-year deadline
lateFilingOptions.descriptionNoException: One-year deadline passed. You may still apply for Withholding of Removal or CAT protection.

findEntryDate.title: Find Your Entry Date
findEntryDate.description: Use I-94 lookup to determine your arrival date for deadline calculations

findCourt.title: Identify Your Immigration Court
findCourt.description: Contact EOIR or check case documents to find your assigned court

subItems.gatherEvidenceDesc: Collect documents, country condition reports, witness affidavits, and personal testimony
subItems.findAttorneyDesc: Find an immigration attorney immediately if you don't have one
subItems.findAttorneyUrgentDesc: Find an immigration attorney immediately if you don't have one
subItems.filingFeeDesc: $100 filing fee required (as of July 22, 2025) - fee waiver available if eligible
subItems.confirmEligibilityDesc: Call USCIS at 1-800-375-5283 to verify you can apply for work authorization
subItems.getPhotosDesc: 2 passport-style photos required for I-765 application
subItems.noFeeDesc: I-765 is free for asylum applicants - do not pay if asked

welcome.title: Welcome to AsylumAssist
welcome.subtitle: Your digital companion for navigating the asylum process in the United States

timeline.title: Timeline Management
timeline.description: Track important deadlines and court dates

forms.title: Form Assistance
forms.description: Get help filling out I-589 and other forms

resources.title: Legal Resources
resources.description: Find legal aid organizations and support

login.title: Log in
login.usernameValidation: Username must be 3-20 characters (letters, numbers, underscore only)
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.loginGenericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

calendar.permissionMessage: To add events to your calendar, please enable calendar access in your device settings.
calendar.noCalendar: No calendar found on your device.
calendar.eventAddedMessage: "{{title}}" has been added to your calendar with reminders.
calendar.eventsAddedMessage: Successfully added {{count}} out of {{total}} events to your calendar with automatic reminders.
calendar.errorMessage: Failed to add event to calendar. Please try again.

notifications.disabledMessage: To receive important deadline reminders, please enable notifications in your device settings.
notifications.deadlineAlertMessage: {{title}} is in {{count}} day. Don't miss this critical deadline!
notifications.deadlineAlertMessage_plural: {{title}} is in {{count}} days. Don't miss this critical deadline!
notifications.errorMessage: Could not schedule reminder notifications. Please check your notification settings.

languageSwitcher.restartMessage: Please restart the app to apply the layout direction change.
languageSwitcher.errorMessage: Failed to change language. Please try again.

authLanding.tagline: Your trusted guide through the asylum process
authLanding.supportText: Track deadlines, manage documents, find legal help
